title: Galaxy Z Fold 4’s camera tipped to include ‘stronger’ telephoto compared to S22 Ultra
content:
The Galaxy Z Fold 4 is quickly shaping up to be a sizeable upgrade to Samsung’s flagship foldable, and that primarily comes from the camera. According to a new report, the Galaxy Z Fold 4 will even best one of the telephoto lenses on the Galaxy S22 Ultra.

more…

The post Galaxy Z Fold 4’s camera tipped to include ‘stronger’ telephoto compared to S22 Ultra appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: According to a new report, Samsung's Galaxy Z Fold 4 will have a solid telephoto camera, and one that's "stronger" than the S22 Ultra.
